title: Crab Quiche
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons butter', '2 tablespoons chopped spring onion', '3 tablespoons chopped red pepper', '225g crab meat, flaked', '1 teaspoon salt and pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons white wine', '3 eggs, beaten', '125ml single cream', '1 (23cm) pastry case, partially baked', '60g grated Gruyere cheese']
